name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Security Analyst with 8 years of experience, I specialize in leveraging **AWS** and modern programming languages like **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Python** to enhance security protocols and compliance across healthcare and financial sectors. My proficiency extends to implementing security measures aligned with standards such as ISO 27001, ISO 27002, SOC 2, and PCI DSS, ensuring that applications and infrastructure meet necessary compliance requirements.
With a solid background in **process documentation**, I am experienced in utilizing tools for Static Application Security Testing (**SAST**) and Software Composition Analysis (**SCA**) to identify vulnerabilities and ensure secure development practices. My expertise also includes building robust systems while maintaining a focus on security best practices.
I excel at collaborating across teams to promote security awareness and streamline security protocols while leveraging my strong experience in cloud environments and full-stack development to contribute to comprehensive security initiatives.
